name: The perils of new technology
description: Explores our fascination with, and our anxiety surrounding, new technology, which is something that can bring about significant cultural change but also danger.

key_work.title: The Cleaners
key_work.headline_credit: Brazil, Germany, Italy, Netherlands and United States of America, 2018
key_work.brief_description: A deep dive into the hidden industry of digital cleaning, which rids the Internet of unwanted violence, porn and political content.

constellations_primary.name: The perils of new technology
constellations_primary.description: Explores our fascination with, and our anxiety surrounding, new technology, which is something that can bring about significant cultural change but also danger.

constellations_other.name: Fake news: too little too late
constellations_other.description: Unbound Creations’ Headliner: NoviNews explores the impact of the media and fake news on society, something that is fast becoming one of the biggest concerns of our age.

end.title: Black Mirror
end.creator_credit: Owen Harris, Toby Haynes, Laurie Borg, Louise Sutton, Phil Sims, Charlie Brooker and William Bridges

video_links.name: Black Mirror | Welcome to the Darkness | Netflix
Black Mirror - Season 3 | Official Trailer [HD] | Netflix
Black Mirror - U.S.S. Callister | Official Trailer [HD] | Netflix

end.brief_description: A contemporary reworking of The Twilight Zone format that taps into our collective unease about our world, particularly our relationship to technology, Black Mirror explores the everyday dystopia we may already be living in.

constellations_other.name: Good vibrations
constellations_other.description: Since its invention, the humble theremin has been used in a number of different ways to evoke all sorts of strange sounds and moods.

constellations_other.name: The perils of new technology
constellations_other.description: Explores our fascination with, and our anxiety surrounding, new technology, which is something that can bring about significant cultural change but also danger.

constellations_other.name: The entire history of you
constellations_other.description: Bellingcat is a journalism collective using social media platforms and surveillance footage for their investigations.

links.description: The Cleaners and Black Mirror both deal with the darker side of new technology. By merging sci-fi and horror, Black Mirror often introduces new technology to the audience only to undermine it with an inherent danger.

end.title: Strange Days
end.creator_credit: Ellen Mirojnick, James Cameron, Steven-Charles Jaffe, 20th Century Fox, Lilly Kilvert, Jay Cocks and Janek Sirrs
end.headline_credit: United States and United States of America, 1995
end.brief_description: In the lead up to the new millennium, Los Angeles is on the brink of anarchy, with crime and racial tensions threatened to explode. Kathryn Bigelow’s groundbreaking sci-fi, neo-noir classic stars Ralph Fiennes as Lenny Nero, a criminal who must solve a friend’s murder.

constellations_other.name: Good vibrations
constellations_other.description: Since its invention, the humble theremin has been used in a number of different ways to evoke all sorts of strange sounds and moods.

constellations_other.name: The perils of new technology
constellations_other.description: Explores our fascination with, and our anxiety surrounding, new technology, which is something that can bring about significant cultural change but also danger.

constellations_other.name: Capturing first-person POV
constellations_other.description: A comparison of how videogames and feature films have used first person POV shots and sequences and how (for the latter) camera technology has impacted on this.

links.description: Kathryn Bigelow’s Strange Days merges elements of film noir, new technology and a Rodney King-influenced narrative to portray technology as a weapon but also as a device that can bring about significant cultural change.

end.title: Alphaville
end.creator_credit: Andre Michelin, André Michelin, Athos Films, Chaumiane, Filmstudio and Jean-Luc Godard
end.brief_description: In his version of a futuristic dystopia, Jean-Luc Godard embraces a tech-noir aesthetic where human beings have become robotic slaves to technology, deprived of individuality and independent thought.

constellations_other.name: The perils of new technology
constellations_other.description: Explores our fascination with, and our anxiety surrounding, new technology, which is something that can bring about significant cultural change but also danger.

links.description: Thirty years before Strange Days, Jean-Luc Godard incorporated elements of film noir with science fiction in Alphaville. Science fiction noir would often juxtapose technological advancement with social decay.

end.title: Dead Set
end.creator_credit: Rebecca Hale, Yann Demange, Channel 4 Television and Zeppotron
end.brief_description: Zombies are rampaging throughout Britain. Blissfully unaware of gory events outside, the Big Brother housemates are in for the ultimate eviction night…

constellations_other.name: The perils of new technology
constellations_other.description: Explores our fascination with, and our anxiety surrounding, new technology, which is something that can bring about significant cultural change but also danger.

links.description: Prior to writing Black Mirror, series creator and writer Charlie Booker wrote the mini-series Dead Set. In a not-so-subtle critique of Reality TV’s mass appeal, the set of a Big Brother-style show comes under threat after a zombie outbreak outside.

start.title: Dead Set

end.title: Big Brother Australia
end.creator_credit: EndemolShine Australia and Southern Star Entertainment

video_links.name: Big Brother Australia | Coming to Channel 7

end.brief_description: Big Brother Australia is the Australian version of the international Big Brother reality television series.

constellations_other.name: The perils of new technology
constellations_other.description: Explores our fascination with, and our anxiety surrounding, new technology, which is something that can bring about significant cultural change but also danger.

links.description: Televised social experiment Big Brother foresaw our willingness to surrender privacy on social media. Featuring strangers who live together under the watchful eye of the titular Big Brother, it is also one of the first reality TV shows.
